mapper.select: SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.SDJ_JNLDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') TXT_SDJ_JNLDATE ,(SELECT MUI_NAME FROM MF_USER_INFO WHERE MUI_ID = A.SDJ_SSUSERID) MUI_NAME ,(SELECT MVI_VVRMNAME FROM MF_VVRM_INFO WHERE MVI_VVRMNO = A.SDJ_VVRMNO) AS MVI_VVRMNAME ,SDJ_WTHENO FROM ( SELECT S.SDJ_DOCNO, S.SDJ_JNLDATE, S.SDJ_VVRMNO, S.SDJ_SSUSERID, S.SDJ_WTHENO, S.SDJ_TEMPL, S.SDJ_TEMPH, S.SDJ_USERINFO, S.CMN_DEL_STS FROM AMS.SY_DAILY_JNL S WHERE SDJ_DOCNO = #{sdj_docno} ) A
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT SVG_DOCNO, SVG_VVRMNO, CMN_DEL_STS, CMN_MAK_DATE, CMN_MAK_PROG, CMN_MAK_ID, CMN_UPD_DATE, CMN_UPD_PROG, CMN_UPD_ID FROM SY_VVRM_GRP WHERE SVG_DOCNO = #{svg_docno} ) A

SELECT A.* ,TO_CHAR(A.JBJ_JNLDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') TXT_JBJ_JNLDATE ,(SELECT MUI_NAME FROM MF_USER_INFO WHERE MUI_ID = A.JBJ_SSUSERID) MUI_NAME ,(SELECT MDI_DPTNAME FROM MF_DPT_INFO DI, MF_TEAM_INFO TI WHERE DI.MDI_LINKNO = TI.MTI_DPTNO AND TI.MTI_TEAMNO = A.MUI_TEAMNO) AS MDI_DPTNAME ,(SELECT MTI_DPTNO FROM MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MTI_TEAMNO = A.MUI_TEAMNO) AS MTI_DPTNO FROM ( SELECT J.JBJ_DOCNO, J.JBJ_JNLDATE, J.JBJ_SSUSERID, J.JBJ_CMNT, J.JBJ_KJSTS, J.CMN_DEL_STS, (SELECT MUI_TEAMNO FROM MF_USER_INFO WHERE MUI_ID = J.JBJ_SSUSERID) AS MUI_TEAMNO FROM AMS.JN_BOKN_JNL J WHERE JBJ_DOCNO = #{jbj_docno} ) A

select JBJ_DocNo, TO_CHAR(JBJ_JNLDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JBJ_JNLDate, JBJ_SSUserID, fn_getUserName(JBJ_SSUserID) as UserName, fn_getAniCnt(JBJ_JNLDate, '0', 'N', 'C') as JRAniClsCnt, fn_getAniCnt(JBJ_JNLDate, '0', 'N', 'A') as JRAniCnt, fn_getAniCnt(JBJ_JNLDate, '0', 'D', 'C') as PSAniClsCnt , fn_getAniCnt(JBJ_JNLDate, '0', 'D', 'A') as PSAniCnt , fn_getAniCnt(JBJ_JNLDate, '', 'K', '') as KSTotCnt , JBJ_CMNT from JN_BOKN_JNL WHERE JBJ_DOCNO = #{JBJ_DOCNO}

SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM, JJDKY_KSType, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('500', '500', JJDKY_KSType) as KSTypeName , JJDKY_KSNo, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('500', '501', JJDKY_KSNo) as KSNoName , BAA_AniCode, MAI_AniClsCode, MAC_Name, TO_CHAR( JJDKY_KSDate ,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJDKY_KSDate, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, MVI_VVRMNAME FROM JN_JINRYO_DATE_KY, BZ_ANI_ATCH, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO, JN_JINRYO_JNL, JN_BOKN_JNL, MF_VVRM_INFO WHERE MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode AND JJJ_RCNo = BAA_DocNo AND JJDKY_JRNo = JJJ_DocNo AND MAI_VVRMNO = MVI_VVRMNO AND JBJ_DOCNO = #{JBJ_DOCNO} ORDER BY RNUM

SELECT FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '1') AS CLS1_NAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '2') AS CLS2_NAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '3') AS CLS3_NAME, MAI_AniCode, MAI_AniClsCode, MAI_BName, MAI_Sex, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as SexName ,MAI_VvrmNo, MTI_TEAMNAME, MVI_VVRMNAME, MDI_DPTNAME, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, MAC_Name, MAC_EName, MAC_NATMON, MAC_Endang,FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','205',MAC_RANK) AS MAC_RANK,MAC_OrgPlace,MAI_ChgAniCode,MAI_InsikNo,MAI_KnjpCnt,FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','204',MAI_KnjpType) AS MAI_KnjpType, MAI_NationalHTNo, MAC_GestPerid,FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','201',MAI_CurSts) AS MAI_CurSts, MAC_SNAME,FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','206',MAC_CITES) AS MAC_CITES, nvl(DAIO_IODate, to_date('1900-01-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')), DAIO_Place, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('100','102',MAI_EarType) AS MAI_EarType, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('100','102',MAI_ChipType) AS MAI_ChipType, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('100','102',MAI_RingType) AS MAI_RingType, FN_GETDPTNAME(MAI_TEAMNO) as TEAMNAME, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','200',MAI_REGTYPE) AS MAI_REGTYPE, MAI_CMNT FROM MF_DPT_INFO,MF_TEAM_INFO, MF_VVRM_INFO,MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO left join ( select DAIO_AniCode, DAIO_IOType, DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place from DT_ANI_IO WHERE ROWNUM <=1 order by DAIO_IODate DESC ) IOInf on DAIO_AniCode = MAI_AniCode WHERE MAI_AniCode=#{MAI_AniCode} AND MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_VVRMNO = MVI_VVRMNO AND MVI_TEAMNO = MTI_TEAMNO AND MTI_DPTNO = MDI_LINKNO

SELECT FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '1') AS CLS1_NAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '2') AS CLS2_NAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '3') AS CLS3_NAME, MAC_Name, MAC_EName, MAC_NATMON, MAC_Endang, MAC_ANICLSCODE, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','205',MAC_RANK) AS MAC_RANK, MAC_OrgPlace, MAC_GestPerid, MAC_SNAME, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','206',MAC_CITES) AS MAC_CITES, MAC_ESTM_TYPE, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','211',MAC_KJJ_TYPE) AS MAC_KJJ_TYPE, MAC_SY_MEANLF, MAC_WY_MEANLF, MAC_GEST_MON FROM MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO WHERE MAI_AniCode= #{MAI_AniCode} AND MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MF_ANI_INFO.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N'

SELECT MAI_REGTYPE, MAI_BNAME, MAI_MLKNAME, MAI_CHGANICODE, MAI_CURSTS, MVI_VVRMNAME, MAI_LOC_HTNO, MAI_NATIONALHTNO, MAI_CHIP_INO, MAI_RING_INO, MAI_EAR_INO, MAI_CMNT, MAI_CMNT, MVI_VVRMNAME, MAI_ANICODE FROM MF_VVRM_INFO,MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO WHERE MAI_AniCode= #{MAI_AniCode} AND MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_VVRMNO = MVI_VVRMNO

SELECT MAI_BirthPlC, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_Birthday, TO_CHAR(MAI_OSRegDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_OSRegDate, MAI_BirthVvrmNo, MAI_ANICODE, MAI_Sex, MAI_FtAniNo, MAI_FtAniName, MAI_MmAniNo, MAI_MmAniName, MAI_HbrdType, MAI_NrtuType, MAI_BORNTYPE FROM MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO WHERE MAI_ANICLSCODE = MAC_ANICLSCODE AND MAI_ANICODE = #{MAI_AniCode}

select PDR_DOCNO, PDR_DETHPROC, TO_CHAR( PDR_PSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM') as PDR_PSDATE, PDR_PSPLACE, PDR_BUKMREQ from PS_DETH_REPT,MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO WHERE MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND PDR_ANICODE = MAI_ANICODE AND MAI_AniCode= #{MAI_AniCode}

select MAI_ImsinSts, TO_CHAR(MAI_ImsinDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_ImsinDate, TO_CHAR(MAI_ResBnmnDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_ResBnmnDate, MAI_BnmnCnt, TO_CHAR(MAI_BNMNDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_BNMNDATE from mf_ani_info I, MF_ANI_CLS C WHERE MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_AniCode= #{MAI_AniCode} AND C.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND I.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N'

select Rownum as Rnum, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','250',DAIO_IOType) AS DAIO_IOType, TO_CHAR(DAIO_IODate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAIO_IODate, TO_CHAR(DAIO_RentEDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAIO_RentEDate, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','251',DAIO_RESN) AS DAIO_RESN, TO_CHAR(DAIO_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAIO_BIRTHDAY, DAIO_BIRTHPLC,DAIO_AGE, DAIO_PRICE,DAIO_NATION from DT_ANI_IO, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO WHERE MAI_AniCode= #{MAI_AniCode} AND MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND DAIO_ANICODE = MAI_ANICODE

SELECT (select MUI_NAME FROM MF_USER_INFO WHERE MUI_ID= P.PDR_USERID) as MUI_NAME, PDR_DOCNO, fn_getDptName(I.MAI_TeamNo) as DptName, TO_CHAR(P.PDR_PSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as PDR_PSDATE, C.MAC_Name, fn_getVvrmName(I.MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, I.MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, TO_CHAR(P.CMN_MAK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as CMN_MAK_DATE, P.PDR_PSPLACE, P.PDR_DETHPROC, P.PDR_CMNT, P.PDR_WAYSCH, P.PDR_BUKMREQ, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, I.MAI_BIRTHDAY)/12,0) as ONE, TRUNC(MOD(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, I.MAI_BIRTHDAY)/12, 1)*12,0) as TWO, I.MAI_ANICODE, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','206',MAC_CITES) AS MAC_CITES, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','205',MAC_CITES) AS MAC_RANK, MAC_NATMON, I.MAI_BNAME FROM PS_DETH_REPT P, MF_USER_INFO U , MF_ANI_INFO I, MF_ANI_CLS C WHERE PDR_DOCNO = #{PDR_DOCNO} AND U.MUI_ID = P.PDR_USERID AND I.MAI_AniCode = P.PDR_AniCode AND I.MAI_AniClsCode = C.MAC_AniClsCode

SELECT B.BBR_DOCNO, V.MVI_VVRMNAME, fn_getDptName(U.MUI_TEAMNO) as DptName, U.MUI_NAME, TO_CHAR(B.BBR_BSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as BBR_BSDATE, B.BBR_ANINAME, TO_CHAR(B.CMN_MAK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as CMN_MAK_DATE, B.BBR_MALECNT, B.BBR_FEMALECNT, B.BBR_BIRTHSTS, B.BBR_FTHANICODE, B.BBR_MTHANICODE, B.BBR_PLNCMNT, BBR_ANICODE FROM MF_VVRM_INFO V, MF_USER_INFO U, BT_BITH_REPT B LEFT JOIN MF_ANI_INFO I on B.BBR_AniCode = I.MAI_ANICODE WHERE B.BBR_DOCNO = #{BBR_DOCNO} AND B.BBR_VvrmNo = V.MVI_VVRMNO AND B.BBR_USERID = U.MUI_ID

SELECT R.JJR_DOCNO, TO_CHAR(R.JJR_RCDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJR_RCDATE, U.MUI_NAME, T.MTI_TEAMNAME, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('300', '303', J.JJJ_JRDZZTYPE) as JJJ_JRDZZTYPE, J.JJJ_JRDZZNAME, J.JJJ_JRCMNT, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('300', '302', J.JJJ_JRSts) as JJJ_JRStsName, J.JJJ_JRSTS, MAC_NAME, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, MAC_EName, MAI_ANICODE, MVI_VVRMNAME, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_Birthday, TO_CHAR(DAIO_IODATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAIO_IODATE, DAIO_PLACE FROM JN_JINRYO_RC R, JN_JINRYO_JNL J, MF_USER_INFO U, MF_TEAM_INFO T, BZ_ANI_ATCH, MF_ANI_INFO, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_VVRM_INFO, DT_ANI_IO WHERE J.JJJ_DOCNO = #{JJJ_DOCNO} AND J.JJJ_DOCNO = R.JJR_JRNO AND BAA_DOCNO = JJR_DOCNO AND BAA_ANICODE = MAI_ANICODE AND MAC_ANICLSCODE = MAI_ANICLSCODE AND DAIO_ANICODE = MAI_ANICODE AND R.JJR_USERID = U.MUI_ID AND MVI_VVRMNO = MAI_VVRMNO AND U.MUI_TEAMNO = T.MTI_TEAMNO

SELECT Rownum as Rnum, TO_CHAR(JJD_JRDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJD_JRDATE, MUI_NAME, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('100', '100', MUI_JCCODE) as MUI_JCCODE, MTI_TEAMNAME FROM JN_JINRYO_DATE, JN_JINRYO_JNL, MF_USER_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE JJJ_DOCNO = #{JJJ_DOCNO} AND JJJ_DOCNO = JJD_DOCNO AND JJD_USERID = MUI_ID AND MTI_TEAMNO = MUI_TEAMNO

SELECT Rownum as Rnum, TO_CHAR(JJD_JRDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJD_JRDATE, MUI_NAME, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name('100', '100', MUI_JCCODE) as MUI_JCCODE, MTI_TEAMNAME, JJDCB_DRUGCODE, JJDCB_USEVOL, JJDCB_CMNT, MDI_NAME, MDI_TYPE, MDI_UNIT, MDI_PURPOSE, MDI_CMNT FROM JN_JINRYO_DATE, JN_JINRYO_JNL, MF_USER_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO, JN_JINRYO_DATE_CB, MF_DRUG_INFO WHERE JJJ_DOCNO = #{JJJ_DOCNO} AND JJD_JRDATE = #{JJD_JRDATE} AND MDI_DRUGCODE = JJDCB_DRUGCODE AND JJDCB_JRNO = JJD_DOCNO AND JJJ_DOCNO = JJD_DOCNO AND JJD_USERID = MUI_ID AND MTI_TEAMNO = MUI_TEAMNO

SELECT JJR_DOCNO, TO_CHAR(JJR_RCDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJR_RCDate, JJR_JRType, JJR_JRNo, BAA_AniCode, JJR_Cmnt, JJR_RCSts, MUI_NAME, MVI_VVRMNAME, MAC_NAME, MTI_TEAMNAME, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_BIRTHDAY)/12,0) as ONE, TRUNC(MOD(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_BIRTHDAY)/12, 1)*12,0) as TWO FROM JN_JINRYO_RC, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO, BZ_ANI_ATCH, MF_USER_INFO, MF_VVRM_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode AND JJR_DocNo = BAA_DocNo AND MTI_TEAMNO = MUI_TEAMNO AND JJR_USERID = MUI_ID AND MVI_VVRMNO = MAI_VVRMNO AND JJR_DOCNO = #{JJR_DOCNO}

select PBR_DOCNO, MUI_NAME, MTI_TEAMNAME, TO_CHAR(PBR_BuDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as PBR_BuDate from PS_BUKM_REPT, MF_USER_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE PBR_DOCNO = #{PBR_DOCNO} AND PBR_USERID = MUI_ID AND MUI_TEAMNO = MTI_TEAMNO

SELECT TO_CHAR(PBR_BuDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as PBR_BuDate, PBR_REQDOCNO, MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE, MVI_VVRMNAME, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, PBR_Weight, TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_BIRTHDAY)/12,0) as ONE, TRUNC(MOD(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, MAI_BIRTHDAY)/12, 1)*12,0) as TWO from PS_BUKM_REPT, PS_DETH_REPT, MF_ANI_INFO, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_VVRM_INFO WHERE PBR_REQDOCNO = PDR_DOCNO AND MAC_AniClsCode = MAI_AniClsCode AND PDR_ANICODE = MAI_ANICODE AND MVI_VVRMNO = MAI_VVRMNO AND PBR_DOCNO = #{PBR_DOCNO}

SELECT PBR_BUDzzName, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 203, PBR_DethBdyPrc) as PBR_DethBdyPrc, PBR_PCSts, PBR_Cmnt, PBR_KSReslt, PBR_PS_Dir, PBR_PS_Pre, PBR_PS_Etc,fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(300, 304, PBR_DzzType) as PBR_DzzType FROM PS_BUKM_REPT WHERE PBR_DOCNO = #{PBR_DOCNO}

SELECT JJDKY_KSSTS,JJJ_DOCNO, JJJ_JRDZZNAME, JJJ_JRCMNT, MAC_NAME, MAC_ENAME, MAI_ANICODE, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, TO_CHAR(JJDKY_KSDATEYY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as JJDKY_KSDATEYY, fn_getVvrmName(MAI_VvrmNo) as VvrmName, DAIO_Place , TO_CHAR(MAI_BIRTHDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD') as MAI_BIRTHDAY, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(500, 500, JJDKY_KSType) as JJDKY_KSType, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE,TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))/12)AS AGE, FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) - FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN( SYSDATE, TO_CHAR(MAI_Birthday,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12 ) * 12 as AGE2 FROM JN_JINRYO_DATE_KY, JN_JINRYO_JNL,BZ_ANI_ATCH, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_ANI_INFO left join ( select DAIO_AniCode, DAIO_IOType, DAIO_IODate, DAIO_Place from DT_ANI_IO WHERE DAIO_IOType = '1' and rownum <=1 order by DAIO_IODate desc ) IOInf on DAIO_AniCode = MAI_AniCode WHERE JJJ_DOCNO = JJDKY_JRNO AND JJJ_RCNO = BAA_DOCNO AND MAI_AniClsCode = MAC_AniClsCode AND MAI_AniCode = BAA_AniCode AND JJJ_DOCNO = #{JJJ_DOCNO}

SELECT FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '1') || '(' || MAC_ANICODE1 || ')' AS CLS1_NAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '2') || '(' || MAC_ANICODE2 || ')' AS CLS2_NAME, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAC_ANICLSCODE || '-' || MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, '3') || '(' || MAC_ANICODE3 || ')' AS CLS3_NAME, A.* FROM ( SELECT MAC_ANICLSCODE, MAC_ANICODE1, MAC_ANICODE2, MAC_ANICODE3, MAC_ANICODE4_SEQ, MAC_NAME, MAC_ENAME, MAC_SNAME, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','206',MAC_CITES) AS MAC_CITES, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','207',MAC_ENDANG) AS MAC_ENDANG , MAC_NATMON, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','207',MAC_RANK) AS MAC_RANK, MAC_ORGPLACE, MAC_BRDPERID, MAC_GESTPERID, CMN_DEL_STS FROM MF_ANI_CLS WHERE MAC_ANICLSCODE = #{mac_aniclscode} ) A

SELECT rownum as RNUM, MAI_ANICODE, MAC_NAME, MAI_BNAME, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, MVI_VVRMNAME, FN_GETCOMCODE_ClS3NAME('200','201',MAI_CurSts) AS MAI_CurSts FROM MF_ANI_MGR, MF_ANI_INFO, MF_ANI_CLS, MF_VVRM_INFO, MF_DPT_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO WHERE MAM_UserID = #{ss_id} AND MAM_AniCode = MAI_AniCode AND MAI_TeamNo = MTI_TeamNo AND MDI_LinkNo = MTI_DptNo AND MAC_AniClsCode = MAI_AniClsCode AND MAI_VvrmNo = MVI_VvrmNo
SELECT * FROM MF_ANI_INFO, MF_ANI_CLS WHERE MAC_ANICLSCODE = MAI_ANICLSCODE AND MAI_ANICODE = #{MAI_ANICODE}

SELECT MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE, fn_getComCode_Cls3Name(200, 202, MAI_Sex) as MAI_GENDER, MAI_BNAME FROM MF_ANI_INFO, MF_ANI_CLS WHERE MAI_ANICLSCODE = MAC_ANICLSCODE AND MF_ANI_INFO.CMN_DEL_STS='N'
AND MAC_Name like '%' || #{ch_s_keyword} || '%'
AND MAI_AniCode like '%' || #{ch_s_keyword} || '%'
